title: Approved for PBE Access but can't create an account
body:
I have received an email from riot saying that I have successfully been selected as a PBE tester. At the end of the email, a link is displayed that I am to follow to create my account on the PBE. However, when I follow the link, the page displayed simply tells me that my application has been received and to wait to hear back from riot. Does anyone know how to fix this or how to proceed with making my PBE account? 

TL;DR Been granted access to PBE, can't make an account, help?

replies.body: The account you are posting from doesn't seem to have been accepted to the PBE.  The email may have been in regards to another account you might have and would need to login to.  Hope that helps!
I only have this one account so it's not that I'm logged into the wrong account, kind of strange. Oh well, guess it was an accidental email from riot lol
